00051     WorldQueryTool::WorldQueryTool(World* GameWorld_)
00052     {
00053         this->GameWorld = GameWorld_;
00054 
00055         this->MouseButtonCache.reset();
00056 
00057         this->KeyboardButtonCache.reset();
00058 
00059         this->MouseXCache=0;
00060         this->MouseYCache=0;
00061 
00062         // create the ray scene query object
00063         this->RayQuery = this->GameWorld->OgreSceneManager->createRayQuery(Ogre::Ray(), Ogre::SceneManager::WORLD_GEOMETRY_TYPE_MASK);
00064         if (NULL == this->RayQuery)
00065             {this->GameWorld->LogAndThrow("Failed to create RaySceneQuery instance in WorldQueryTool"); }
00066         this->RayQuery->setSortByDistance(true);
00067     }
00068 
00069     WorldQueryTool::~WorldQueryTool()
00070     {
00071         delete this->RayQuery;
00072     }

00080     bool WorldQueryTool::IsMouseButtonPushed(short unsigned int MouseButton)
00081     {
00082         if(MouseButton >= this->MouseButtonLimit)
00083             {this->GameWorld->LogAndThrow("Unsupported mouse button access through WorldQueryTool");}
00084         return this->MouseButtonCache[MouseButton];
00085     }

00087     bool WorldQueryTool::IsKeyboardButtonPushed(MetaCode::InputCode KeyboardButton)
00088         {return this->KeyboardButtonCache[KeyboardButton];}

00091     void WorldQueryTool::GatherEvents(bool ClearEventsFromEventMgr)
00092     {
00093         //this->KeyboardButtonCache.reset();
00094 
00095         std::list<EventUserInput*>* UserInput = this->GameWorld->GetEventManager()->GetAllUserInputEvents();   // Get the updated list of events
00096         if( ClearEventsFromEventMgr )
00097             { this->GameWorld->GetEventManager()->RemoveAllSpecificEvents(EventBase::UserInput); }
00098 
00099         //For each metacode adjust any needed info
00100         for(std::list<EventUserInput*>::iterator Iter = UserInput->begin(); Iter!=UserInput->end(); Iter++) //for each event
00101         {
00102             for(unsigned int c = 0; c<(*Iter)->GetMetaCodeCount(); c++) //For each metacode in the event
00103             {                                                           //Newer Items should take precedence of older ones, so only store the oldest ones
00104                 if( (*Iter)->GetMetaCode(c).IsKeyboardButton() ) //is it a Key
00105                 {
00106                     if(0 <= (*Iter)->GetMetaCode(c).GetMetaValue()) //see MetaCode::ButtonState
00107                     {
00108                         this->KeyboardButtonCache.set( (*Iter)->GetMetaCode(c).GetCode() );
00109                     }else{
00110                         this->KeyboardButtonCache.reset( (*Iter)->GetMetaCode(c).GetCode() );
00111                     }
00112                 }
00113 
00114                 if ( MetaCode::MOUSEABSOLUTEHORIZONTAL == (*Iter)->GetMetaCode(c).GetCode() )
00115                     { this->MouseXCache = (*Iter)->GetMetaCode(c).GetMetaValue(); }
00116 
00117                 if ( MetaCode::MOUSEABSOLUTEVERTICAL == (*Iter)->GetMetaCode(c).GetCode() )
00118                     { this->MouseYCache = (*Iter)->GetMetaCode(c).GetMetaValue(); }
00119 
00120                 if ( MetaCode::MOUSEBUTTON == (*Iter)->GetMetaCode(c).GetCode() )
00121                 {
00122                     if(0 <= (*Iter)->GetMetaCode(c).GetMetaValue()) //see MetaCode::ButtonState
00123                     {
00124                         this->MouseButtonCache.set( (*Iter)->GetMetaCode(c).GetID() );
00125                     }else{
00126                         this->MouseButtonCache.reset( (*Iter)->GetMetaCode(c).GetID() );
00127                     }
00128                 }
00129                 /// @todo Add support for joysticks events to WorldQueryTool
00130             }
00131         }
00132 
00133         if( ClearEventsFromEventMgr )//Erase everything if we were asked to.
00134         {
00135             for(std::list<EventUserInput*>::iterator Iter = UserInput->begin(); !UserInput->empty(); Iter = UserInput->begin())
00136             {
00137                 delete(*Iter);
00138                 UserInput->remove(*Iter);
00139             }
00140         }
00141     } // \GatherEvents

00144     ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00145     // Raycasting Nonsense goe here
00146     Vector3WActor* WorldQueryTool::GetFirstActorOnRayByPolygon(Ray ActorRay)
00147     {
00148         Ogre::Ray Ooray = ActorRay.GetOgreRay();
00149 
00150         if(NULL != this->RayQuery)          //Double check that the Rayquery is valid
00151         {
00152             this->RayQuery->setRay(Ooray);
00153             if( this->RayQuery->execute().size() <= 0 ) //Did we hit anything
00154             {
00155                 return NULL;
00156             }
00157         }else{                          //Whoopsie something Failed
00158             this->GameWorld->LogAndThrow("Attempting to run a query on Null RaySceneQuery");
00159         }
00160 
00161         // at this point we have raycast to a series of different objects bounding boxes.
00162         // we need to test these different objects to see which is the first polygon hit.
00163         // there are some minor optimizations (distance based) that mean we wont have to
00164         // check all of the objects most of the time, but the worst case scenario is that
00165         // we need to test every triangle of every object.
00166         Ogre::Real closest_distance = -1.0f;
00167         Vector3 closest_result;
00168         Ogre::RaySceneQueryResult &query_result = this->RayQuery->getLastResults();
00169         Vector3WActor* ClosestActor = new Vector3WActor();
00170         for (size_t qr_idx = 0; qr_idx < query_result.size(); qr_idx++)
00171         {
00172             // stop checking if we have found a raycast hit that is closer than all remaining entities
00173             if ( (0.0f <= closest_distance) && (closest_distance < query_result[qr_idx].distance))
00174                 { break; }
00175 
00176             // only check this result if its a hit against an entity
00177             if ((NULL != query_result[qr_idx].movable) && (0 == query_result[qr_idx].movable->getMovableType().compare("Entity")))
00178             {
00179                 // get the entity to check
00180                 Ogre::Entity *pentity = static_cast<Ogre::Entity*>(query_result[qr_idx].movable);
00181 
00182                 // mesh data to retrieve
00183                 size_t vertex_count;
00184                 size_t index_count;
00185                 Ogre::Vector3 *vertices;
00186                 unsigned long *indices;
00187 
00188                 // get the mesh information
00189                 this->GetMeshInformation(pentity, vertex_count, vertices, index_count, indices,
00190                                   pentity->getParentNode()->_getDerivedPosition(),
00191                                   pentity->getParentNode()->_getDerivedOrientation(),
00192                                   pentity->getParentNode()->_getDerivedScale());
00193 
00194                 // test for hitting individual triangles on the mesh
00195                 bool new_closest_found = false;
00196                 for (size_t i = 0; i < index_count; i += 3)
00197                 {
00198                     // check for a hit against this triangle
00199                     std::pair<bool, Ogre::Real> hit = Ogre::Math::intersects(Ooray, vertices[indices[i]], vertices[indices[i+1]], vertices[indices[i+2]], true, false);
00200 
00201                     // if it was a hit check if its the closest
00202                     if (hit.first && ((0.0f > closest_distance) || (hit.second < closest_distance)) )
00203                     {
00204                         closest_distance = hit.second;                        // this is the closest so far, save it off
00205                         new_closest_found = true;
00206                     }
00207                 }
00208 
00209                 // free the verticies and indicies memory
00210                 delete[] vertices;
00211                 delete[] indices;
00212 
00213                 // if we found a new closest raycast for this object, update the closest_result before moving on to the next object.
00214                 if (new_closest_found)
00215                 {
00216                     closest_result = Ooray.getPoint(closest_distance);
00217                     ClosestActor->Actor = this->GameWorld->GetActorManager()->FindActor( pentity->getParentNode() );
00218                 }
00219             } // \if entity
00220         } // \if qr_idx
00221 
00222         //Change the closest point into a point relative to the Actor
00223         if (ClosestActor->Actor != NULL)
00224             { ClosestActor->Vector = closest_result - ClosestActor->Actor->GetLocation(); }
00225         return ClosestActor;
00226     }
00227 
00228     Vector3WActor* WorldQueryTool::GetFirstActorOnRayByAABB(Ray ActorRay)
00229     {
00230         #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00231         this->GameWorld->Log("WorldQueryTool::GetFirstActorOnRayByAABB:");
00232         #endif
00233         Ogre::Ray Ooray = ActorRay.GetOgreRay();
00234 
00235         if(NULL != this->RayQuery)          //Double check that the Rayquery is valid
00236         {
00237             this->RayQuery->setRay(Ooray);
00238             if( this->RayQuery->execute().size() <= 0 ) //Did we hit anything
00239             {
00240                 return NULL;
00241             }
00242         }else{                          //Whoopsie something Failed
00243             this->GameWorld->LogAndThrow("Attempting to run a query on Null RaySceneQuery");
00244         }
00245 
00246         Ogre::RaySceneQueryResult &query_result = this->RayQuery->getLastResults();
00247 
00248         if (0 < query_result.size())
00249         {
00250             Ogre::Entity *pentity = static_cast<Ogre::Entity*>(query_result[0].movable);
00251             Vector3WActor* ClosestActor = new Vector3WActor();
00252             ClosestActor->Actor = this->GameWorld->GetActorManager()->FindActor( pentity->getParentNode() );
00253             /// @todo TODO: The function WorldQueryTool::GetFirstActorOnRayByAABB does not return an valid offset. This needs to be calculated somehow.
00254             /// @todo TODO: The function WorldQueryTool::GetFirstActorOnRayByAABB has not been tested and needs to be tested
00255             return ClosestActor;
00256         }else{
00257             return 0;
00258         }
00259     }
00260 
00261     Vector3WActor* WorldQueryTool::GetActorUnderMouse(Real RayLength, bool UsePolygon)
00262     {
00263         Vector3WActor* Results = 0;
00264 
00265         Ray* MouseRay = this->GetMouseRay(RayLength);
00266 
00267         if (UsePolygon)
00268         {
00269             Results = this->GetFirstActorOnRayByPolygon( *MouseRay );
00270         }else{
00271             Results = this->GetFirstActorOnRayByAABB( *MouseRay );
00272         }
00273 
00274         delete MouseRay;
00275         return Results;
00276     }
00277 
00278     Vector3* WorldQueryTool::RayPlaneIntersection(const Ray &QueryRay, const Plane &QueryPlane)
00279     {
00280         #define PHYSDEBUG
00281         #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00282         this->GameWorld->LogStream << "WorldQueryTool::RayPlaneIntersection("<< QueryRay << ", " << QueryPlane << ")" << endl;
00283         #endif
00284         try{
00285             Vector3 u = QueryRay.To - QueryRay.From;
00286             Vector3 p0 = Vector3(0,0,0);
00287 
00288             if(QueryPlane.Normal.X == 0 && QueryPlane.Normal.Y == 0 && QueryPlane.Normal.Z == 0)
00289             {
00290                 #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00291                 this->GameWorld->Log("WorldQueryTool Error:Invalid Plane. Plane contains no points.");
00292                 #endif
00293                 return 0;
00294             }
00295             else{
00296                 if(QueryPlane.Normal.X != 0)
00297                 {
00298                      p0 = Vector3(QueryPlane.Distance,0,0);
00299                 }
00300                 else if(QueryPlane.Normal.Y != 0)
00301                 {
00302                      p0 = Vector3(0,QueryPlane.Distance,0);
00303                 }
00304                 else
00305                 {
00306                      p0 = Vector3(0,0,QueryPlane.Distance);
00307                 }
00308             }
00309 
00310             #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00311             GameWorld->LogStream << " WorldQueryTool p0: " << p0 << " QUERYPLANE D:" << QueryPlane.Distance << endl;
00312             #endif
00313 
00314             Vector3 w = QueryRay.From - p0;
00315 
00316             Real D = u.dotProduct(QueryPlane.Normal);
00317             Real N = -1 * w.dotProduct(QueryPlane.Normal);
00318 
00319             Real SMALL_NUM = 0.00000001;
00320 
00321             if( (D<0? -D : D) < SMALL_NUM)  //Checks if the Plane behind the RAy
00322             {
00323                 if(N == 0)
00324                 {
00325                     return new Vector3(QueryRay.From);
00326                 }
00327                 else
00328                 {
00329                     #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00330                     this->GameWorld->Log("WorldQueryTool Error: num<SMALL_NUM: Ray casted with no intersection point.");
00331                     #endif
00332                     return 0;
00333                 }
00334             }
00335 
00336             Real sI = N/D;
00337 
00338             if(sI < 0 || sI > 1) //checks if the ray is too long
00339             {
00340                 #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00341                 this->GameWorld->Log("WorldQueryTool Error:(si<0 || si > 1: Ray casted with no intersection point.");
00342                 #endif
00343                 return 0;
00344             }
00345 
00346             Vector3 test =  Vector3(QueryRay.From + (u * sI));
00347 
00348             #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00349             this->GameWorld->LogStream << "WorldQueryTool: RayPlane Intersection RESULTS   X:" << test.X << " Y:" << test.Y << " Z:" << test.Z << endl;
00350             #endif
00351 
00352             Vector3* return_vector = new Vector3(QueryRay.From + (u * sI));
00353 
00354             Real distance = return_vector->Distance(QueryRay.From);
00355 
00356             if(distance > QueryRay.From.Distance(QueryRay.To))
00357             {
00358                 #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00359                 this->GameWorld->Log("WorldQueryTool Error:Ray casted hits plane but is not long enough.");
00360                 #endif
00361                 return 0;
00362             }
00363 
00364             #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00365             this->GameWorld->LogStream << "Distance:" << distance << endl;
00366             #endif
00367 
00368             return return_vector;
00369         } catch(exception e) {
00370             //In case we divide b
00371             this->GameWorld->Log("WorldQueryTool Error:Failed while calculating Ray/Plane Intersection, Assuming no valid intersection. Error follows:");
00372             this->GameWorld->Log(e.what());
00373             return 0;
00374         }
00375     }
00376 #undef PHYSDEBUG

00378     Ray* WorldQueryTool::GetMouseRay(Real Length)
00379     {
00380         Ray* MouseRay = new Ray( this->GameWorld->GetCameraManager()->GetCameraToViewportRay(
00381                 float(this->GetMouseX()) / float( this->GameWorld->GetGraphicsManager()->getRenderWidth() ) ,
00382                 float(this->GetMouseY()) / float( this->GameWorld->GetGraphicsManager()->getRenderHeight() )
00383             ) );
00384 
00385         (*MouseRay) *= Length;
00386         return MouseRay;
00387     }

00390     // Private Members
00391     void WorldQueryTool::GetMeshInformation( Ogre::Entity *entity,
00392                                 size_t &vertex_count,
00393                                 Ogre::Vector3* &vertices,
00394                                 size_t &index_count,
00395                                 unsigned long* &indices,
00396                                 const Ogre::Vector3 &position,
00397                                 const Ogre::Quaternion &orient,
00398                                 const Ogre::Vector3 &scale)
00399     {
00400         bool added_shared = false;
00401         size_t current_offset = 0;
00402         size_t shared_offset = 0;
00403         size_t next_offset = 0;
00404         size_t index_offset = 0;
00405         vertex_count = index_count = 0;
00406 
00407         Ogre::MeshPtr mesh = entity->getMesh();
00408 
00409 
00410         bool useSoftwareBlendingVertices = entity->hasSkeleton();
00411 
00412         if (useSoftwareBlendingVertices)
00413         {                                   //10,000th line of code
00414             entity->_updateAnimation();
00415         }
00416 
00417         // Calculate how many vertices and indices we're going to need
00418         for (unsigned short i = 0; i < mesh->getNumSubMeshes(); ++i)
00419         {
00420             Ogre::SubMesh* submesh = mesh->getSubMesh( i );
00421 
00422             // We only need to add the shared vertices once
00423             if(submesh->useSharedVertices)
00424             {
00425                 if( !added_shared )
00426                 {
00427                     vertex_count += mesh->sharedVertexData->vertexCount;
00428                     added_shared = true;
00429                 }
00430             }
00431             else
00432             {
00433                 vertex_count += submesh->vertexData->vertexCount;
00434             }
00435 
00436             // Add the indices
00437             index_count += submesh->indexData->indexCount;
00438         }
00439 
00440 
00441         // Allocate space for the vertices and indices
00442         vertices = new Ogre::Vector3[vertex_count];
00443         indices = new unsigned long[index_count];
00444 
00445         added_shared = false;
00446 
00447         // Run through the submeshes again, adding the data into the arrays
00448         for ( unsigned short i = 0; i < mesh->getNumSubMeshes(); ++i)
00449         {
00450             Ogre::SubMesh* submesh = mesh->getSubMesh(i);
00451 
00452             //Ogre::VertexData* vertex_data = submesh->useSharedVertices ? mesh->sharedVertexData : submesh->vertexData;
00453             Ogre::VertexData* vertex_data;
00454 
00455             //When there is animation:
00456             if(useSoftwareBlendingVertices)
00457             {
00458                 //    #ifdef BUILD_AGAINST_AZATHOTH
00459                 //             vertex_data = submesh->useSharedVertices ? entity->_getSharedBlendedVertexData() : entity->getSubEntity(i)->_getBlendedVertexData();
00460                 //    #else
00461                 vertex_data = submesh->useSharedVertices ? entity->_getSkelAnimVertexData() : entity->getSubEntity(i)->_getSkelAnimVertexData();
00462                 //    #endif
00463             }else{
00464                 vertex_data = submesh->useSharedVertices ? mesh->sharedVertexData : submesh->vertexData;
00465             }
00466 
00467             if((!submesh->useSharedVertices)||(submesh->useSharedVertices && !added_shared))
00468             {
00469                 if(submesh->useSharedVertices)
00470                 {
00471                     added_shared = true;
00472                     shared_offset = current_offset;
00473                 }
00474 
00475                 const Ogre::VertexElement* posElem = vertex_data->vertexDeclaration->findElementBySemantic(Ogre::VES_POSITION);
00476                 Ogre::HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr vbuf = vertex_data->vertexBufferBinding->getBuffer(posElem->getSource());
00477                 unsigned char* vertex = static_cast<unsigned char*>(vbuf->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00478 
00479                 // There is _no_ baseVertexPointerToElement() which takes an Ogre::Real or a double
00480                 //  as second argument. So make it float, to avoid trouble when Ogre::Real will
00481                 //  be comiled/typedefed as double:
00482                 //      Ogre::Real* pReal;
00483                 float* pReal;
00484 
00485                 for( size_t j = 0; j < vertex_data->vertexCount; ++j, vertex += vbuf->getVertexSize())
00486                 {
00487                     posElem->baseVertexPointerToElement(vertex, &pReal);
00488                     Ogre::Vector3 pt(pReal[0], pReal[1], pReal[2]);
00489                     vertices[current_offset + j] = (orient * (pt * scale)) + position;
00490                 }
00491 
00492                 vbuf->unlock();
00493                 next_offset += vertex_data->vertexCount;
00494             }
00495 
00496 
00497             Ogre::IndexData* index_data = submesh->indexData;
00498             size_t numTris = index_data->indexCount / 3;
00499             Ogre::HardwareIndexBufferSharedPtr ibuf = index_data->indexBuffer;
00500 
00501             bool use32bitindexes = (ibuf->getType() == Ogre::HardwareIndexBuffer::IT_32BIT);
00502 
00503             unsigned long*  pLong = static_cast<unsigned long*>(ibuf->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00504             unsigned short* pShort = reinterpret_cast<unsigned short*>(pLong);
00505 
00506 
00507             size_t offset = (submesh->useSharedVertices)? shared_offset : current_offset;
00508             size_t index_start = index_data->indexStart;
00509             size_t last_index = numTris*3 + index_start;
00510 
00511             if (use32bitindexes)
00512             {
00513                 for (size_t k = index_start; k < last_index; ++k)
00514                     { indices[index_offset++] = pLong[k] + static_cast<unsigned long>( offset ); }
00515             }else{
00516                 for (size_t k = index_start; k < last_index; ++k)
00517                     { indices[ index_offset++ ] = static_cast<unsigned long>( pShort[k] ) + static_cast<unsigned long>( offset ); }
00518             }
00519 
00520             ibuf->unlock();
00521             current_offset = next_offset;
00522         }
00523     }
00524 }
